channel.title: My quest to 99 fletching
channel.description:
Every day after school im no-lifing for a little over a week untill 99.
[b]Current:[/b] 77.
[b]Fletching:[/b] yew longbows
[b]Plan:[/b] yews until 80 then buy 100 mages to make shortbows and sell to noobs later. at 85 make mage longbows still leaving enough money for a backup 1k yew sups. at 99 sell all my yew longs and alch my mage longs
[b]Totally money that will be earned:[/b] 8-9m
[b]Pictures:[/b] Soon.
Please suggest on what i should do, or advice to go faster.

item.title: My quest to 99 fletching
item.dc:creator: @x_ancients_x x ancients x
item.description:
@x_ancients_x wrote:

my friend just got 99 flecthing…im have just started it myself on my skiller acc i got to 73 flecthing in 2 days or 3…i have now started to get my hunter to 99 so that i should have some money to get fletching to 99 quicker and then maybe cooking … good luck on your goal

Read full topic

item.title: My quest to 99 fletching
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:18, topic:146641”]Back in the day (RS2, ~May 05) I wrote a SCAR script and went from 1 to 70 fletching in a day or two, then on the night of the second day, I started my script, went to bed, and woke up the next morning to find myself still logged in, with the mouse pointer having a seizure over the minimap. I had forgotten to set a color the night before, needless to say when I went to log in later that day I was banned. That is what stopped my addiction to runescape and I haven’t played since.

Moral of the story:

  1. Don’t forget to set your colors
  2. If you want to stop playing runescape, get banned.

Good luck on your goal ;D[/quote]

You know your oldschool when you still talk about colours. There are better methods for detecting colours now.

I remember Squig’s tokkuler, left it on all night and it had only fought for an hour or so before being teleported to fally after dieing, was there for almost 9 hours just walking about, didn’t get banned though. ;D

Sorry for thread hijack. ;p

Read full topic

item.description:

Yeah, Im going for 99 too, Im 92 at the moment, and Im only HALF way

item.title: My quest to 99 fletching
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I buy my logs, then cut them into unstrung bows, they give 75 xp ea, same with stringing.

Read full topic

item.title: My quest to 99 fletching
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=".Kaboom, post:16, topic:146641"][quote author=exe626 link=topic=200693.msg1785736#msg1785736 date=1190968326]
Suggestion: Buy Unstrung bows and Bow strings and no life that. Don’t bother cutting them yourself(epic waste of time). You will save a lot of time just stringing, cutting the bows takes like 3/4 of the time because of the animation for each bow, and it gives about 1/4 of the experience for each stringing. You’ll get your levels faster than ever.
[/quote]

Cutting = 75 xp
Stringing = 75xp
mster[/quote]Then its either changed or your lying. I do remember getting about 3/4 more exp. for stringing than cutting.

Edit: I looked it up and yes, it is the same. But why? I remember getting so much more exp. for stringing. Did they change it because of the update?

Read full topic

item.title: My quest to 99 fletching
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Back in the day (RS2, ~May 05) I wrote a SCAR script and went from 1 to 70 fletching in a day or two, then on the night of the second day, I started my script, went to bed, and woke up the next morning to find myself still logged in, with the mouse pointer having a seizure over the minimap. I had forgotten to set a color the night before, needless to say when I went to log in later that day I was banned. That is what stopped my addiction to runescape and I haven’t played since.

Moral of the story:

  1. Don’t forget to set your colors
  2. If you want to stop playing runescape, get banned.

Good luck on your goal ;D

Read full topic

item.title: My quest to 99 fletching
item.dc:creator: @Zanyex Zanyex
item.description:
@Zanyex wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:7, topic:146641”][quote author=Zanyex link=topic=200693.msg1784215#msg1784215 date=1190924031]

Um, about the whole summer, only because I don’t play too much. I played maybe 30 minutes every 2 days? lol

Im playing 4 hours a day, getting 2 lvls a night, then on the weekends im nonstop hardcore training.

The words " Sad act " Come to mind ?
[/quote]
what?[/quote]

No lifing on a game for some pixels, I must say, you have great goals.

Read full topic

item.title: My quest to 99 fletching
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

exe626:

Suggestion: Buy Unstrung bows and Bow strings and no life that. Don’t bother cutting them yourself(epic waste of time). You will save a lot of time just stringing, cutting the bows takes like 3/4 of the time because of the animation for each bow, and it gives about 1/4 of the experience for each stringing. You’ll get your levels faster than ever.

Cutting = 75 xp
Stringing = 75xp
mster
